job.title: Senior Software Engineer, Data Connectivity team (Full Stack)
job.description: emTo get the best candidate experience please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating effortsbrbremstrong Job Category strongProducts and Technologystrong Job Details brbrstrongThe Data Connectivity team at Tableau manages the connectivity layer which enables connections to various data sources and the ability to import that data into Tableau Our team consists of individuals from diverse backgrounds with several years of experience at wellknown tech companiesbrbrWe follow a lightweight agile process with reduced meetings for scrumsprint planning so each individual is responsible for managing their workload Our team is fastpaced and has an incredible worklife balance We try to ensure that folks take advantage of our unlimited vacation policybrbrWe are building the nextgeneration connectivity framework using a modern tech stack and are looking for excellent problem solvers who will thrive in our fastpaced environmentbrbrstronguAbout The RolebrbrustrongAs a Full Stack Engineer on the Data Connectivity team you will be leading building and owning backend services connectors SDK CLI and various other components of the new architecture You will work closely with folks across the organization to deliver highimpact features You will gain insights into how the connectivity layer works with hundreds of databases and SaaS productsbrbrWe strive for a high standard of engineering quality while solving unique scalability challenges and delivering delightful experiences You will be working on a highly visible product that was a result of a recent hackathonbrbrTableau hires company builders employees are expected to be on the constant lookout for the best talent to bring on board helping Tableau continue to build one of the best companies in the worldbrbrstronguYou ArebrustrongulliFluent in the JavascriptTypescriptNodeJS ecosystemliliComfortable driving features endtoend and choosing the right tools amp libraries for the jobliliAble to tackle complex engineering problems and deliver resultsliliSolid understanding of REST APIs and good intuition designing customerfacing APIsliliCreative selfstarter excited to solve ambiguous and challenging problemsliliEnjoy working with the latest tech and are motivated to learn and teach othersliliComfortable with design patterns data structures algorithms and system design liulstrongKey responsibilitiesbrstrongulliWork with the team on product architecture and drive the implementationliliBuild high quality welltested components with developer experience and customers in mindliliUnderstand the existing architecture and make improvements to the new systemliliManage your sprint work itemsliliAuthor design docs and drive design reviews with the broader teamliliOther duties as assigned liulstrongTechnologies we usebrstrongulliModern Javascript  TypescriptliliNodeJS  ElectronliliReact  Jest  ParcelliliOther projects use C  C  Java  Python liulstrongBonusbrstrongulliExperience working with Typescript and ReactliliYou have developed and shipped customerfacing SDK  APIsliliAttention to detail and developer experienceliliExperience decomposing a large monolith into microservicesliliComfortable working on new technologiesliliExperience with plugin architecturesliliFamiliar building distributed systemsliliYou love to participate in hackathonsbrliulstrong Accommodations brbrstrongIf you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Formbrbrstrong Posting Statement brbrstrongAt Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the state of our world Each of us has a responsibility to drive Equality in our communities and workplaces We are committed to creating a workforce that reflects society through inclusive programs and initiatives such as equal pay employee resource groups inclusive benefits and more Learn more about Equality at Salesforce and explore our benefitsbrbruSalesforcecomu and uSalesforceorgu are Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employers Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender perception or identity national origin age marital status protected veteran status or disability status uSalesforcecomu and uSalesforceorgu do not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes uSalesforcecomu and uSalesforceorgu will not pay any thirdparty agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with uSalesforcecomu or uSalesforceorgu brbrSalesforce welcomes all
